Name: assign_worker_to_team
Description: Binary: 1 if worker is assigned to a team; 0 otherwise.

Name: assign_worker_to_project
Description: Binary: 1 if worker is assigned to a project; 0 otherwise.

Name: select_feature_for_sprint
Description: Binary: 1 if feature is selected for the current sprint; 0 otherwise.

Name: select_user_story_for_sprint
Description: Binary: 1 if user story is selected for the current sprint; 0 otherwise.

Name: assign_task_to_worker
Description: Binary: 1 if task is assigned to a worker; 0 otherwise.

Name: choose_scrum_master_for_team
Description: Binary: 1 if Scrum Master moderates a team; 0 otherwise.

Name: choose_product_owner_for_project
Description: Binary: 1 if Product Owner manages a project's backlog; 0 otherwise.

Name: set_sprint_length_days
Description: Integer number of days in the sprint.

Name: allocate_budget_to_feature
Description: Real-valued budget allocated to a feature.

Name: set_team_size
Description: Integer team size for a project/team.

Name: set_feature_priority
Description: Integer priority assigned to a feature.

Name: decide_story_points_for_user_story
Description: Integer story points for a user story.
